title: Free Courses with Certificates
description: A curated collection of free online courses offering certificates across various domains.
fullDescription: This repository offers a comprehensive list of free online courses that provide certificates upon completion. It serves as a valuable resource for individuals seeking to enhance their skills and showcase their achievements. The project is open for contributions, allowing others to add more courses and improve the repository's structure.

title: MemeGenerator
description: A React-based web application that allows users to create and customize memes.
fullDescription: MemeGenerator is a web application built with React and styled using Tailwind CSS. It enables users to create memes by selecting images and adding custom text. The application is designed to be user-friendly and responsive, providing a seamless experience across devices.

title: Weather App
description: A simple weather application built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that fetches real-time weather data from the OpenWeather API.
fullDescription: This weather application allows users to check the current weather conditions of any city by entering its name. It utilizes the OpenWeather API to fetch real-time data and displays it in a user-friendly interface. The project is designed to help beginners understand how to work with APIs and handle asynchronous data in JavaScript.

title: Assessing women's safety in Indian cities through Twitter Data Analysis
description: Focuses on the role of social media in promoting the safety of women in Indian cities with special reference to the role of social media websites and applications like Twitter platform.
fullDescription: we use TWEEPY package from python to download tweets from twitter but every time INTERNET will not available to download tweets online so we downloaded MEETOO tweets on women safety and safe inside dataset folder. Application will read the tweets to detect womenâ€™s sentiments.

title: Image Filtering Studio
description: An interactive web app that lets users apply various filters and transformations to images in real time.
fullDescription: Image Filtering Studio is a web-based application that allows users to upload images and apply a variety of filters and enhancements, such as grayscale, blur, edge detection, and more. Built with Flask and OpenCV, it processes images efficiently and provides instant visual feedback. The project demonstrates skills in image processing, web integration, and UI interactivity.

title: MusicSphere
description: An interactive music streaming web app that lets users explore, play, and filter songs with a clean UI.
fullDescription: MusicSphere is a web-based music library where users can explore tracks by language and play them directly in-browser. Built with HTML, CSS, XML and JavaScript, it emphasizes lightweight performance and ease of navigation.

title: MyFlix - Video Playback Website
description: A web-based video playback platform that allows users to stream, and browse videos with a responsive interface.
fullDescription: MyFlix is a responsive video streaming website where users can browse and play videos. Built entirely with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it focuses on clean UI, efficient playback controls, and seamless user experience.
